description: Analysis of Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA) biopsy cell measurements for breast cancer risk assessment
clinician_warning:
⚠️ HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL USE ONLY

This tool analyzes Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA) biopsy cell measurements from pathology lab reports. These are imaging-derived features from professional cell analysis, NOT patient-providable values.

Requirements:
• FNA biopsy results from certified pathology lab
• Cell nucleus measurements (mean, SE, and worst values)
• Professional interpretation of results

This tool is intended for:
• Oncologists and pathologists
• Healthcare professionals with access to FNA reports
• Clinical decision support (not standalone diagnosis)

radius_mean.description: Mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter
radius_mean.help_text: From FNA report: mean radius of cell nuclei (typical range: 6-28)

texture_mean.help_text: From FNA report: texture measurement (typical range: 9-40)

perimeter_mean.description: Mean size of the core tumor
perimeter_mean.help_text: From FNA report: mean perimeter (typical range: 43-189)

area_mean.help_text: From FNA report: mean area (typical range: 143-2501)

concave_points_mean.description: Mean number of concave portions of the contour
concave_points_mean.help_text: From FNA report: concave points (typical range: 0-0.20)

concavity_mean.description: Severity of concave portions of the contour
concavity_mean.help_text: From FNA report: concavity severity (typical range: 0-0.43)

radius_worst.help_text: From FNA report: worst (largest) radius value

concave_points_worst.description: Largest mean value for concave points
concave_points_worst.help_text: From FNA report: worst concave points value

screening.disclaimer: Preliminary analysis based on basic cell measurements. Full cell panel strongly recommended for clinical decisions.

standard.description: Standard FNA cell analysis with mean values
standard.disclaimer: Standard analysis. Worst-value features significantly improve diagnostic accuracy.

confirmation.description: Comprehensive FNA analysis with mean and worst values
confirmation.disclaimer: High-confidence analysis. Results should be confirmed by pathologist review.

general_disclaimer:
⚠️ PROFESSIONAL USE ONLY

This tool analyzes Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA) biopsy cell measurements and is intended for healthcare professionals only. It is NOT for patient self-diagnosis.

The cell measurements required (radius, texture, perimeter, area, concavity, etc.) are derived from microscopic analysis of biopsy samples and can only be obtained from certified pathology laboratory reports.

This tool provides decision support only and does NOT replace:
• Professional pathological examination
• Clinical judgment of oncologists
• Standard diagnostic protocols
• Biopsy confirmation
result_disclaimer:
This analysis is based on FNA cell measurements and provides risk assessment only, NOT a diagnosis.

Results must be:
• Interpreted by a qualified oncologist or pathologist
• Confirmed with additional diagnostic procedures as clinically indicated
• Considered alongside patient history and clinical presentation

Benign results do not rule out malignancy. Suspicious results require further investigation.
